entry.title: In Obliterated Kharkiv, Ukrainian Survivors Struggle to Hold Out
entry.content: Parts of what was a sophisticated hub of Ukraine’s science and research now lack basic amenities like running water and electricity. Some 2,000 high-rises have been destroyed, according to the municipality.

entry.title: Russia Advances in Ukraine's Donbas, Is Accused of Digging Mass Graves
entry.content: Russian forces slowly made gains in Ukraine’s east, as Ukrainian officials said thousands of people have been buried in mass graves in Mariupol, most of which has been seized by Russia after nearly two months of combat.
